commands.name: ls
commands.description: This command list all the files in the current directory

commands.name: cat
commands.description: This command displays the content of a file

commands.name: cd
commands.description: This command changes the current directory

commands.name: touch
commands.description: This command creates a new file

commands.name: mkdir
commands.description: This command creates a new directory

commands.name: rm
commands.description: This command removes a file or directory

commands.name: github
commands.description: This command opens my github profile

commands.name: pwd
commands.description: This command displays the current directory

commands.name: node
commands.description: This command runs a node.js script

commands.name: about
commands.description: This command displays information about me
